ability_1.name: Smoke Launcher
ability_1.description: Fire a high-velocity smoke canister that explodes into a smoke wall on impact.

ability_2.name: Double Time
ability_2.description: Taking fire while sprinting makes you move faster for a brief time.

ability_3.name: Rolling Thunder
ability_3.description: Call in an artillery strike that slowly creeps across the landscape.

ability_1.name: Eye of the Allfather
ability_1.description: Briefly reveal hidden enemies, traps, and clues throughout structures in front of you.

ability_2.name: Tracker
ability_2.description: See tracks left behind by your foes.

ability_3.name: Beast of the Hunt
ability_3.description: Enhances your senses, allowing you move faster and highlighting your prey.

ability_1.name: Nox Gas Trap
ability_1.description: Drop canisters that release deadly Nox gas when shot or triggered by enemies.

ability_2.name: Nox Vision
ability_2.description: Allows you to see enemies through your gas.

ability_3.name: Nox Gas Grenade
ability_3.description: Blankets a large area in Nox gas. Damage increases the longer an enemy is inside of it.

ability_1.name: Dome of Protection
ability_1.description: Throw down a dome-shield that blocks attacks for 15 seconds. Players inside of the dome heal faster.

ability_2.name: Gun Shield
ability_2.description: Aiming down sights deploys a gun shield that blocks incoming fire.

ability_3.name: Defensive Bombardment
ability_3.description: Call in a concentrated mortar strike on a marked position.

ability_1.name: D.O.C. Heal Drone
ability_1.description: Call your Drone of Compassion to automatically heal nearby teammates over time.

ability_2.name: Combat Medic
ability_2.description: Revive knocked down teammates faster while protected by a shield wall. Healing items are used 25% faster.

ability_3.name: Care Package
ability_3.description: Call in a drop pod full of high-quality defensive gear.

ability_1.name: Psyche Out
ability_1.description: Send out a holographic decoy to confuse the enemy.

ability_2.name: Encore!
ability_2.description: Automatically drop a decoy and cloak for five seconds when knocked down. Mirage also cloaks while using a respawn beacon and reviving a teammate (the teammate is also cloaked).

ability_3.name: Vanishing Act
ability_3.description: Deploy a team of Decoys to distract enemies while you cloak.

ability_1.name: Grappling Hook
ability_1.description: Grapple to get to out-of-reach places quickly.

ability_2.name: Insider Knowledge
ability_2.description: Scan a survey beacon to reveal the ring’s next location.

ability_3.name: Zipline Gun
ability_3.description: Create a zipline for everyone to use.

ability_1.name: Into the Void
ability_1.description: Reposition quickly through the safety of void space, avoiding all damage.

ability_2.name: Voices from the Void
ability_2.description: A voice warns you when danger approaches. As far as you can tell, it’s on your side.

ability_3.name: Dimensional Rift
ability_3.description: Link two locations with portals for 60 seconds, allowing your entire team to use them.

ability_1.name: Stim
ability_1.description: Move 30% faster for six seconds. Costs health to use.

ability_3.name: Launch Pad
ability_3.description: Deploy a jump pad that catapults teammates through the air.

ability_1.name: Perimeter Security
ability_1.description: Connect nodes to create electrified fences that damage and slow enemies.

ability_2.name: Spark of Genius
ability_2.description: Ultimate Accelerants fully charge your Ultimate Ability, and standing near interception pylons boosts your Tactical Ability recharge.

ability_3.name: Interception Pylon
ability_3.description: Place an electrified pylon that destroys incoming ordnance and repairs damaged shields as long as it stands.

ability_1.name: Surveillance Drone
ability_1.description: Deploy an aerial camera drone. 40 second cooldown if destroyed.

ability_2.name: Neurolink
ability_2.description: Crypto and his teammates see what his Surveillance Drone detects up to a 30m distance.

ability_3.name: Drone EMP
ability_3.description: Charge up an EMP from your drone. The blast deals 50 shield damage, slows players, and destroys traps.

ability_1.name: Silence
ability_1.description: Throw a device that deals damage and disables enemy abilities for 10 seconds.

ability_2.name: Stalker
ability_2.description: You crouch walk faster and can climb walls higher. Crouch-walking speed is the same as his walking speed. Can climb walls twice as high.

ability_3.name: Death Totem
ability_3.description: Drop a totem that protects users from death. Instead of getting killed of downed, you will return to the totem.

ability_1.name: Burglar's Best Friend
ability_1.description: Teleport to hard-to-reach places or escape trouble quickly by throwing your Jump Drive bracelet.

ability_2.name: Eye for quality
ability_2.description: Nearby epic and Legendary loot can be seen through walls. The range is the same as Black Market Boutique.

ability_3.name: Black Market Boutique
ability_3.description: Place a portable device that allows you to teleport nearby loot to your inventory. Each friendly or enemy Legend can take up to two items.
